metadata.title: CVE-2022-38150 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
In Varnish Cache 7.0.0, 7.0.1, 7.0.2, and 7.1.0, it is possible to causethe Varnish Server to assert and automatically restart through forgedHTTP/1 backend responses. An attack uses a crafted reason phrase of thebackend response status line. This is fixed in 7.0.3 and 7.1.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi2 - 7.1.1-1
varnish - 7.1.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.1.1-1').
